name: Runaway Magic
description:
A simple game about a runaway mage, an excessive amount of mushrooms, and a lava lamp. Play as the inanimate green runaway mage as they try to put as much distance between their teacher’s servants and themselves as possible, and try to get a handle on their magic powers.

You know what they say though… the more magic you use, the more fungus is among you

Dialogue scripting - Yarn  https://github.com/infiniteammoinc/yarn

Parsing of the dialogue -  YarnSpinner  https://github.com/thesecretlab/YarnSpinner

All art assets except the player character - Kenney.nl http://www.kenney.nl/

Music(via the Fake Music Generator) -  cgMuisic http://codeminion.com/blogs/maciek/2008/05/cgmusic-computers-create-music/
